annotations.description:
Thank you for being interested in this special Youth Forum. This Youth Forum is a collaborative effort between the Ministry of Justice of Japan （MOJJ）  and the Thailand Institute of Justice（TIJ） to take our future generations to the forefront of policy-making and creating impact, especially in the justice sector! 

If you want to learn more about this forum, please see the documents below...
Concept Note : https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KylrD8BCRouygPlkxHV1-LjCA0tM--TBZt1_FYd3H44/edit
FAQ: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ghZzPHnnYzPmDdNuqR1Y5rvs-XyJ6FtcIp91EZJwwA0/edit

Before filling out the application, please read the instructions: 
Please answer every question and upload documents or video files, when it's necessary, as instructed
Any additional materials sent to us through other channel that is not this Google Form will not be considered as a part of the application
The application process and selection is at the ultimate discretion of MOJJ and TIJ. The decisions made by MOJJ and TIJ is definite and final. 
The application can be submitted from now until 20 April 2023 at 18:00 Japan time
The decisions will be sent to the email provided in the application in April, 2023
Should you have any questions or concerns, please contact MOJ-Itn-Conference9@i.moj.go.jp
annotations.title: Application for ASEAN-Japan Special Youth Forum (Residents in Japan)
